meanings.definition: The art or science of combining vocal or instrumental sounds to produce beauty of form, harmony, and expression of emotion.
meanings.sent1: I love listening to musick while I study.
meanings.sent2: The musick at the concert was so beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The musick playing in the elevator made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like musick to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The musick of the wind through the trees was calming.

meanings.sent1: The musician performed a new musick at the recital.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy playing musick on my guitar.
meanings.sent3: The musick composed by the cat walking on the piano keys was surprisingly pleasant.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a symphony of musick to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The musick of the rain tapping on the roof was soothing.
